TEI.2.document_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 832-833
TEI.2.document_title: James Bowie to Stephen F Austin, 08-08-1832

barker_notes.barker_summary: James Bowie to Austin, August 8, 1832. Announcing expulsion of Piedras's garrison from Nacogdoches.
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 832-833

text.body:
*div1 type="summary"* *p*James Bowie to Austin, August 8, 1832. Announcing expulsion of Piedras's garrison from Nacogdoches.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**location_mentioned*Angeline */location_mentioned**date_mentioned n="08-08-1832">Augt. 8th. 1832*/date_mentioned**/p* *p**person_mentioned*Coln Stephn F Austin*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*Sir I write to inform you that the *person_mentioned*12th. Regt. of Infantry formerly of *location_mentioned*Nagodoches*/location_mentioned**/person_mentioned* and in command of*person_mentioned* Col. Jose de las Piedras */person_mentioned*has been induced by certain *person_mentioned*American */person_mentioned*arguments to declare in favor of the Constitution of *person_mentioned*Sa Anna*/person_mentioned*—that *person_mentioned*Col. Piedras*/person_mentioned* is a *person_mentioned*prisoner */person_mentioned*in *location_mentioned*Town */location_mentioned*soon to be dispatched for *location_mentioned*Anahuac*/location_mentioned*,—and that the *person_mentioned*Regt*/person_mentioned*. has put itself under my command. They are now on their march for *person_mentioned*San Felipe de Austin*/person_mentioned* They are very destitute of necessaries, and in particular of horses and provisions. The *person_mentioned*Officers */person_mentioned*are many of them on foot. If you have, or can procure twenty horses or cattle or provisions on a/c of Govt, and will forward them on to meet us you will much facilitate the cause of our *person_mentioned*Chief */person_mentioned*We depend much on you in this thing.*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*James Bowie*/person_mentioned* [Rubric]*/p*
*p*P. S. There have been killed in the recent action at *location_mentioned*N.------*/location_mentioned*of the *person_mentioned*Spanards */person_mentioned*33, and about 17 or 18 *person_mentioned*wounded*/person_mentioned*—of the *person_mentioned*Sa Annistas*/person_mentioned* 3 and 7 *person_mentioned*wounded*/person_mentioned*. More particus on arrival. The *person_mentioned*Alcalde of N. */person_mentioned*among *person_mentioned*killed*/person_mentioned**/p*.
*p**person_mentioned*J B.*/person_mentioned**/p*
*/div1*
